column4: Integrate with RoadWare to allow linkage to and display of video images and attribute data obtained from video logs.
Capture, store, view, and utilize in analyses data collected via RoadWare.
Capture, store, view, and utilize date of inspection/survey in RoadWare.
Capture, store, view, and utilize in analyses the IRI left wheel path from RoadWare.
Capture, store, view, and utilize in analyses the IRI right wheel path from RoadWare.
Capture, store, view, and utilize in analyses the IRI average from RoadWare.
Capture, store, view, and utilize in analyses the half car roughness from RoadWare.
Capture, store, view, and utilize in analyses the legacy 3 point rutting from RoadWare.
Capture, store, view, and utilize in analyses average rut depth from RoadWare.
Capture, store, view, and utilize in analyses the transverse profile (1280 points across the lane) from RoadWare.
Capture, store, view, and utilize in analyses the left wheel path rutting from RoadWare.
Capture, store, view, and utilize in analyses the right wheel path rutting from RoadWare.
Capture, store, view, and utilize in analyses the faulting from RoadWare.
Capture, store, view, and utilize in analyses the mega texture left wheel path from RoadWare.
Capture, store, view, and utilize in analyses the mega texture right wheel path from RoadWare.
Capture, store, view, and utilize in analysis the mega texture center of the lane from RoadWare.
Capture, store, view, and utilize in analyses the macro texture (ASTM E 1845) from RoadWare.
Capture, store, view, and utilize in analyses the percent grade from RoadWare.
Capture, store, view, and utilize in analyses cross slope from RoadWare.
Capture, store, view, and utilize in analysis horizontal curvature from RoadWare.
Capture, store, view, and utilize in analyses vertical curvature from RoadWare.
Provide ability to link to and retrieve digital images of the perspective view of the pavement from RoadWare.
Provide ability to link to and retrieve digital images of the perspective view of the right shoulder of the pavement in RoadWare.
Provide ability to link to and retrieve digital images of the perspective view of the pavement surface in RoadWare.
Provide ability to link to and retrieve 360 degree digital images in RoadWare.
Provide ability to link to and retrieve digital images of the perspective view of the distance between mileposts in RoadWare.
Provide ability to link to and retrieve digital images of the perspective view of the offset in RoadWare.
